title: Who Is & Was the Education Minister of India? (1947-2025)
snippet: Each Education Minister, from the days of independence to the present, has left a distinct mark on the country’s academic fabric. As of 2025, Shri Dharmendra Pradhan serves as India’s Education Minister.

title: Ministry of Education (India) - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1985, the Rajiv Gandhi government changed its name to the Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD), and with the newly drafted "National Education Policy 2020" by the Narendra Modi government, the Ministry of Human Resource Development was renamed back to the Ministry of Education.

title: Education Ministers of India: Terms, Parties, and Prime Ministers
snippet: The first Education Minister of India was Abul Kalam Azad.

title: List of Education Ministers of India 1947 to 2025 and Tenure
snippet: From Maulana Abul Kalam Azad to Dharmendra Pradhan, there wasn’t a single Education Minister who settled for mediocre human capital but took important strides in extending literacy, higher education, digital learning and educational policy reform.
